attributes.action: Include Transgender people in the UK conversation therapy ban
attributes.additional_details: It’s just wrong I don’t think I even need to say anything more you banned it for gay people but not transgender???

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Ensure Trans people are fully protected under any conversion therapy ban
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/613556

This petition was debated in Parliament on 13 June 2022. You can watch the debate back here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HJp31qE36rQ
